parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets if group icons added with [[addGroupIcon]] are visible on map and in the HUD.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.93.145657 this command returns [[Nothing]] as it should</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setGroupIconsVisible''' [showOnMap, showOnHUD]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [showOnMap, showOnHUD]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> showOnMap: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to show on map. Default - [[false]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> showOnHUD: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to show on HUD. Default - [[false]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] (prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145657 this command returned [[Object]] of [[objNull | null]] value)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setGroupIconsVisible]] [true,true];  
([[group]] [[player]]) [[addGroupIcon]] ["b_inf", [0, 0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addGroupIcon]], [[clearGroupIcons]], [[getGroupIcon]], [[getGroupIconParams]], [[groupIconSelectable]], [[groupIconsVisible]], [[onGroupIconClick]], [[removeGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIconParams]], [[setGroupIconsSelectable]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
